thread.title: Hong Kong Stock Exchange Kills Dual-Class Share Plan
thread.title_full: Hong Kong Stock Exchange Kills Dual-Class Share Plan - WSJ

author: Jacky Wong
title: Hong Kong Stock Exchange Kills Dual-Class Share Plan
text:
Hong Kong’s stock exchange said it has terminated a plan to allow dual-class shares and other weighted-voting structures after objection from the city’s market regulator, ending the yearlong debate on the proposal in the wake of Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s New York listing.
Hong Kong doesn’t allow new listings with shareholding structures that give one class of investors more rights than another, a stance that lost it the record... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
